Users can view a TikTok-style feed of these products, express interest ("I'd like to participate in the drop"), and are associated with a pickup point. When enough users from the same pickup point reserve items from the same supplier's list, a "drop" is activated with a timer. Users can then "PRENOTA CON CARTA" (book with card), and as more users book, the discount percentage increases. Once the drop closes, users' cards are charged, the order is sent to the supplier, and users are notified when their items are ready for pickup at their chosen location.
